ICICI Bank has released transcripts of its recent media and earnings calls, providing insights into its financial performance for the quarter and year ending March 31, 2025. The bank also discussed future outlooks and risks, emphasizing ongoing economic reforms and market conditions.

ICICI Bank has allotted 2,842 equity shares under its Employees Stock Unit Scheme-2022, approved by the Board of Directors and executed by two Executive Directors. The allotment was completed on April 25, 2025.
